header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Family, house heating, workmates, Christmas presents, future holiday plans, money, interview, friends, German history, TV shows, neighbours
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, requesting, anecdote telling
